attributes.action: British Airways and All Major Airlines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I take offence to why a 5-6hours flight to parts of the Continent like Nigeria cost more than flights to parts of America and Europe of similar duration. Please don't mention that it is for business reasons, because there are daily flights and most if not all carriers fly there. Most travellers also complain of poor customer service especially from the 'National Carrier' BA!! I urge the PM to put pressure on the Airlines or at the very least BA. BA should lead the way!!!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
